text: Brrdā p̄hū̂ thī̀ phūd keī̀yw kæ̀ phī̀n̂xng k̄hxng phwk k̄heā doythī̀ phwk k̄heā nạ̀ng c̄hey xyū̀ ẁā t̄ĥā h̄āk phwk k̄heā cheụ̄̀xfạng reā phwk k̄heā k̆ mị̀ t̄hūk ḳh̀ā cng kl̀āw t̄heid (muḥạmmạd) ẁā phwk th̀ān cng p̂xngkạn khwām tāy h̄ı̂ pĥn cāk tạw k̄hxng phwk th̀ān t̄heid h̄āk phwk th̀ān phūd cring
